lines.text:
[George sleeps after using 2 sleeping pills, and on there way to the hospital, his head is leaning on the window of the car]
Hey wat up wit dat face, huh? Dat suppose to be me?
[the others in car chuckle]
Ya gotta problem? Lozer?

[Franck roles down the window a little]
No we do not have a problem, so leaf us alone!
'Leaf'? What are you a tree?
Ha, ha, ha, very funny, you are obviously a comodian
[pronounced Coe - Maw - Dee - Un]
Hey what kinda accent is that man? What planet are ya from?
Vat Planet? The planet of not wanting to be die, by a drive by SHOOTING!

[both chanting to George]
Every party has a pooper, that why we invited you! Party pooper! Party pooper! Every party has a pooper, that's why we invited you, George Baaanks!
I'm, 4-foot 6, I don't shave, I don't have a job, and I'm gonna be an uncle. Is there something weird about that?
Finally, someone who thinks like I do.
Oh, yeah, a 12 year old.
How would you like to go through life with the name Cooper Banks-Mackenzie? The kid's gonna sound like a law firm.

Mr Habeeb, please, You see this pathway? I laid these bricks with my own two hands, I planted this grass, I built this fence, I BROKE THAT WINDOW WITH A FRISBEE, I painted these shutters. Don't bulldoze my memories man sell me back my home.
For how much?
Two Vastnick is like, "Bye, George! See you next Thursday!"
[Annie is in labor. Dragging sleeping George out by the head. Drops head and looks around]
Gee, I could change this room... THIS IS NOT THE TIME TO THINK ABOUT THIS FRANCK!
I have to admit, having Franck at the house did help. Although I had no idea what he did there all day.

[Marching]
Do the baby 'vorkout'! Make those babies gleefull! Oh, that's good. Little tin soldiers. Happy tin soldiers. Richt. And now with an attitude.
[throws head back]
Hello! Who you? Get 'avay'! I don't like 'vat' you say!
We could sell this house in a second. It's the Leave It to Beaver house that everybody wants.
Just because we're older doesn't mean we're old. This is the 90s.
one child, two seniors, thanks.
What are we, the Schmaltz family?

Mr Habeeb, this is not a piece of land. This is my home and I'm gonna be a father again and I don't want to bring my baby home to a condo on the beach! I wanna drive down that street and I wanna pull into this driveway and I wanna honk my horn...
Father of the bride and a baby? GET OUT OF TOWN.
[referring to Frank's accent]
What planet are you from, man?
The planet of not wanting to die by a drive by shooting!
[speeds off]
Commence to start!
What am I supposed to do? Sleep standing up?

[talking about his baby's name]
Franck Banks - has sort of a continental ring to it.
Matty, what's going on?
May I be excused?
No, no sir. You may NOT be excused.
[George gets up to leave]
George?
The guy offered me $10,000 to be out of the house in ten days.
The guy offered you $10,000 to out of the house in ten days?
I hope you took it, George.
He did. And he threw in Mom's favorite dishes just to close the deal.
George!
[yells an order in Arabic]
